scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "SERVER,FRONTEND" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold" "cd server && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "SERVER,FRONTEND" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold" "cd server && pnpm build" "cd frontend && pnpm build"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "SERVER,FRONTEND" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold" "cd server && pnpm start" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
scripts.prod: pnpm install && pnpm prepare && pnpm build && pnpm start:prod
